BlackRock's Hildebrand says UK would suffer under a BrexitBlackRock's Hildebrand says UK would suffer under a Brexit LONDON A senior figure at the world's biggest asset manager said on Monday that Britain going it alone outside the European Union would be devastating for the City of London as a global financial center and endanger jobs.
